title: Water management
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Peter Dimond and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Comic dramatisation is used to stress the importance of water conservation. Studies Adelaide’s water supply system to explain how and why water should be conserved. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
